# cumulative

**Instance Property**

An effect that enables each layer of a symbol-based image in sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
var cumulative: VariableColorSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Discussion

This effect enables each successive variable layer, and the layer remains enabled until the end of the animation cycle. This effect cancels the [doc://com.apple.symbols/documentation/Symbols/VariableColorSymbolEffect/iterative] variant.

## Controlling fill style

- **iterative**: An effect that momentarily enables each layer of a symbol-based image in sequence.
